name: @rvp/api
description: RVP API server (Express + TS + Prisma + SQLite) - Force rebuild v2

scripts.build: echo 'ðŸš€ Starting Prisma Client generation...' && prisma generate && echo 'âœ… Prisma Client generated successfully' && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json --skipLibCheck
scripts.start: echo 'ðŸš€ Starting API server with fresh Prisma Client...' && node dist/index.js
scripts.db:push: doppler run --config dev -- prisma db push
scripts.db:push:local: doppler run --config local -- prisma db push
scripts.db:push:prod: doppler run --config prd -- prisma db push
scripts.db:migrate: doppler run --config dev -- prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:migrate:local: doppler run --config local -- prisma migrate dev
scripts.dev:migrate:deploy: doppler run --config dev -- prisma migrate deploy
scripts.bootstrap:dev: npm run dev:migrate:deploy && npm run dev:generate && npm run dev:seed && npm run dev:create-admin && npm run dev:create-tenants && npm run dev:create-chain
scripts.local:migrate:deploy: doppler run --config local -- prisma migrate deploy
scripts.bootstrap:local: npm run local:migrate:deploy && npm run local:generate && npm run local:seed && npm run local:create-admin && npm run local:create-tenants && npm run local:create-chain
